info: Welcome to Joja Express! We provide three different services:$Joja Community is a express service centered in the Joja markets in the communities. You can buy products from the local shops online in the community, and the products will be instantly send to you using the Joja Parrots provided by Morris. Joja Community only provide long term and stable products, temperory or random products won'e be included. This service will not be avaliable if the local community doesn't have a joja market.$ Joja Global allows you to buy products in cheapest price all over the world instead of the local community. Therefore, it will have a delivery time and a freight fee depends on some percentage of the price of the products you have brought. The percentage various and the current percentage is {{percent}} of the product. The products will be delivered on the next day through mails. $Joja | Qi is a collaborative project with Mr. Qi, provides everything in Mr. Qi's shop.$ For Joja Commuunity and Joja Global, you can find a search box on the bottom-left cornor of the menu. You can search items using the search box
prompt: Welcome to Joja Online Shopping Centre, What can I help you
mail_format: Thank you for using Joja Global. The following are the items you have bought on the previous day, please check the following package! Note that after receiving this package, Joja will not be responsible for any damages including any loss or defect of the itmes in this package. %item id ofts.jojaExp.item.package.global 1 %%[letterbg 4]
item.package.descrip.global: A global express package sent by JojaExpress
item.package.descrip.local: An express package sent by JojaExpress
item.jpad.descrip: A Pad made by Joja Corporation (Better than IPad!) Can be used for online shopping
fee_NoJoja_tip: Extra carriage fees when joja goes out of business, in percentage
fee_Member_tip: Extra carriage fees when you have a membership, in percentage
openByKey: Can open shop using key bind
openByPhone_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using Phone
openByKey_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using key bind
openByPad_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using JPad
CloseWhenCCComplete: Close Joja Community When Community Centre is completed
